name: Jquery.dob
body:
#Demo [Click to demonstration](http://xenophon566.github.io/jquery.dOb/) #Getting Started Dropdown menu for date choosing. As following : 
$("#myBirthDate").dOb({
    dOb_Y: '#dOb_Y', // element year
    dOb_M: '#dOb_M', // element month
    dOb_D: '#dOb_D', // element day	
    from_Y: 1911, //from year(default: 1911)
    to_Y: 2013, //to year(default: 2013)
    isPadding: true //padding zero(default: true)
});
#Document HTML as following :
`
